metadata.synopsis: The player finds an automaton head that they might have encountered back in the underdark.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aturn on peace mode in ReconGo to -1954; -1; 186click on S_LOW_AutomatonComponent_Clickable_59ec4b0f-8dde-4739-ace5-c6286bd7743d

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *This head belonged to the automaton you encountered in the Underdark. How did it come to be here?*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *This peculiar head is part of an automaton, but it doesn't resemble any Steel Watcher you've encountered.*
